title: Time to Buy Amazon (AMZN) Stock After AWS Fuels Strong Q1 Results
text: Amazon (AMZN) was the latest tech giant to impressively top Q1 expectations reporting after-market hours on Tuesday and seeing its stock spike +2% in today's trading session.

title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy broke federal labor law with anti-union remarks
text: A National Labor Relations Board judge, citing 2022 interviews with CNBC, Bloomberg and the New York Times, found Amazon CEO Andy Jassy broke labor law.

title: Why Amazon Stock Jumped Today
text: Amazon beat sales and earnings expectations in the first quarter. Artificial intelligence continues to drive demand for AWS.

title: Amazon, Microsoft, and Alphabet are doubling down on AI for the cloud — and it seems to be paying off
text: Amazon, Microsoft, and Alphabet's first quarter earnings surpassed Wall Street's estimates.  Execs credit some of the gains to their AI efforts, which they say help boost cloud revenue.

title: Utah house cat stows away in Amazon box and weathers shipment to California
text: Galena, a 6-year-old house cat from Utah, likes hiding in and playing with cardboard. Earlier this month, that fact made for a stressful trip in an Amazon package, a feverish search, a California rescue and a tearful reunion.

title: Estée Lauder Targets New Customers With Amazon Storefront, ‘Creator Council'
text: Estée Lauder Companies' debut of its first brand on the U.S. Amazon Premium Beauty store has “greatly exceeded” the company's retail sales expectations so far.

title: Anthropic Launches Claude Chatbot App, Expands Enterprise Offering
text: Artificial intelligence (AI) company Anthropic is launching its first smartphone app and a new enterprise subscription plan to expand the reach of its Claude chatbot.

title: Analysts Are Pounding the Table on These 3 Stocks: April 2024
text: Sometimes a company's debut or the release of a new product can stir analysts into a frenzy. Other times, careful consideration of long-term trends and performance can drive improved public opinion of a company's prospects.

title: Amazon Stock Is Moving Higher Today. Time to Buy the Stock?
text: Amazon beat estimates on the top and bottom lines. Revenue growth at AWS is accelerating.

title: Anthropic unveils iPhone app for chatbot to rival Open AI's ChatGPT
text: Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) and Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG)'s Google, is expanding access to its Claude chatbot with the launch of its first smartphone app, available for free and paid users. The iPhone app synchronizes conversations with the web-based version, offering seamless integration for users.

title: Stock Market Crash Alert: 3 Must-Buy Dow Stocks When Prices Plunge
text: The Dow Jones Industrial Average has been around since 1885. The index contains 30 stocks and has regularly added and removed holdings from the list.

title: US lawmaker probes FTC work with EU to block Amazon iRobot merger
text: The chair of the House Oversight Committee said Wednesday he is investigating the Federal Trade Commission's (FTC) work with the European Commission in the collapse of Amazon.com's plan to acquire iRobot Corp in a $1.4 billion deal.

title: Anthropic Launches iOS App Featuring AI Chatbot Claude
text: Anthropic launched an iOS app featuring its artificial intelligence chatbot, Claude. The app makes the chatbot accessible “from anywhere, any time,” the company said in a Wednesday (May 1) press release.

title: All Eyes on Fed Rate Decision: Key Stocks to Watch
text: Investors are hoping to avoid a replay of January's outcome, which saw the worst performance for the S&P 500 on a Fed day dating back to March 2023.

title: Amazon (AMZN) Q1 Earnings & Sales Beat Estimates, Rise Y/Y
text: Amazon's (AMZN) first-quarter results benefit from strength in the AWS, Prime and advertising businesses. Strengthening relationships with third-party sellers act as other tailwinds.

title: Walmart is closing down its health centers. What's that mean for Amazon, Walgreens and CVS?
text: Walmart Inc. WMT, -0.43% announced Tuesday it's closing its 51 health centers after the retail giant admitted the business had not seen sustainable profits since its inception in 2019.

title: Anthropic introduces a free iPhone app and an enterprise offering
text: Anthropic is in focus this morning after introducing a free iPhone app as well as an enterprise offering to ramp up competition with OpenAI. The new business tier called “Team” required at least five users and costs $30 a month.

title: ETFs to Tap Amazon's Q1 Earnings Beat, AI Growth
text: Amazon (AMZN) reported robust first-quarter 2024 results, wherein it beat both earnings and revenue estimates driven by growth in its advertising and AI-powered cloud computing units.

title: Amazon not as far behind the AI race as many perceive, says investment bank
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN)'s first-quarter results surpassed expectations at investment bank Jefferies. The e-commerce giant's net sales and operating income came in 0.5% and 37% above consensus respectively, “largely driven by outperformance at AWS", noted Jefferies analysts, referring to cloud-computing service Amazon Web Services.

title: Amazon Stock Up 2% On AI-Driven Growth, Despite Weak Forecast
text: After reporting first-quarter results, Amazon is chugging along pretty well under the leadership of CEO Andy Jassy.

title: Amazon Stands Tall: New Highs Are in Sight
text: The bar was set high for Amazon NASDAQ: AMZN, so the Q1 results were doubly strong. The takeaway is that the multinational retail and web services conglomerate is firing on all cylinders, providing favorable guidance, and analysts are lifting their targets.

title: Amazon Business Celebrates Third Annual Small Business Month with New Immersive Educational Hub and Over $250,000 in Grants
text: SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Amazon Business (NASDAQ: AMZN), the company's business-to-business procurement store, today kicked off its third annual Small Business Month to help support the growth of small businesses in the U.S. This year, Small Business Month includes an exciting and interactive new online resource center called Small Business Success Studio [https://business.amazon.com/studio]. The studio provides small businesses with free online educational tools and resources to start, run, a.

title: Amazon Beats, Starbucks Misses, Fed Scheduled To Deliver
text: Stocks, which were down all-day Tuesday, saw accelerated selling into the close. When the day finally came to an end, the S&P 500 was down 1.6% and the Nasdaq Composite was off 2%. The selloff was widespread with all eleven sectors of the S&P down on the day. For the month, the S&P 500 was down 4.2%, its worst month since September. The Nasdaq Composite dropped 4.4%.
